channel.title: Need the Ban and Ipban command
channel.description:
Hi. I need a ban and Ipban command, that you can adjust it to no ban the owner.
Many Thanks

item.source: Need the Ban and Ipban command

item.title: Need the Ban and Ipban command
item.dc:creator: @killer90210 killer90210
item.description:
@killer90210 wrote:

ok hold on[br][size=1]Posted on: November 15, 2007, 10:36:50 AM[/size][hr]if (command.startsWith("ipban") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { String victim = command.substring(6); int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim); client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index]; if(victim.equalsIgnoreCase("Heyman")) { sendMessage("You can not IP ban the owner!"); } else if(playerRights <= v.playerRights && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Lothy")) { sendMessage("You can not IP ban someone who has equal or higher rights!"); } else { if(server.banHandler.checkAlreadyBannedIps(v.connectedFrom)) { sendMessage(victim+" has already been banned!"); } else { sendMessage(victim+" has been successfully IP banned"); server.banHandler.appendToIp(v.connectedFrom); v.disconnected = true; } } } catch(ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException e) { sendMessage("That player is either offline or the name is invalid"); } } if(command.startsWith("banuser") && (playerRights >= 2)) { String victim = command.substring(8); if(!victim.equalsIgnoreCase("Nic")) { if(server.banHandler.checkBannedUsers(victim)) { sendMessage(victim+" has already been banned!"); } else { sendMessage(victim+" has been successfully banned"); server.banHandler.appendToBanned(victim); PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; } } else { sendMessage("You can not ban the server owner!"); } }[/code

soz bought double post

Read full topic
